title: The Queen in Germany
creator_credit: Ulrich Weidmann, Manfred Purzer and Cinecentrum
brief_description: The visit of Queen Elizabeth and the Duke of Edinburgh was a token of reconciliation between Britain and Germany. Shows the official welcome at Bonn, by the Federal President; journey by steamer up the Rhine; a performance of Die Rosenkavalier in Munich; inspection of the British garrison in Berlin; a farewell dinner on the Royal Yacht Britannia before departing from Hamburg. Narrated by George Vine.
